Toughan (amụrụ na 1926, n'Ijipt) bụ onye Ijipt na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ese egwu.
A mụrụ Toughan n'Ijipt n'afọ 1926 ma a zụlitere ya na Cairo
N'afọ 1946, ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nta akụkọ na onye na-ese ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin ndị Ijipt
Ọrụ mbụ ya na nke a na-akpọsa nke ọma bịara n'oge ọ nọ na Rose al-Yūsuf, magazin ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama kwa izu na magazin Akhbar El Yom kwa izu
N'afọ 1953, mgbe mgbanwe nke mere ka onye isi ala Gamal Abdel Nasser chịa, Toughan bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ Al Gomhuria kwa ụbọchị
N'afọ 1980, Toughan mepụtara magazin na-ese ihe nkiri kwa izu, Caricature, ya na onye na-ese foto ibe ya Mustafa Hussein.
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Toughan ebipụtala ihe karịrị ihe osise pụkụ ịrị ise na akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa ụbọchị, magazin na akwụkwọ iri na otu nwere ihe osise kemgbe 1946.
Ahmed Toughan bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye, nke gụnyere Head of Arab Cartoonists (1987), Human Rights Award (1988), na Grand Medal of Fine Art (1997)
A na-ewere Toughan dị ka otu n'ime ndị a na-asọpụrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Arab World.
